languages.text: {n}血伶人脸上掠过一丝微笑。{/n}“别了，猴子。”
languages.original_text: {n}A faint smile crosses the xenos's face.{/n} "Farewell, mon-keigh."

languages.text: {n}異種族の顔にかすかな笑みが浮かんだ。{/n}「お別れだな、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: {n}A faint smile crosses the xenos's face.{/n} "Farewell, mon-keigh."

languages.text: {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln huscht übers Gesicht des Xenos.{/n} "Lebt wohl, Chem-Pan-Sey."
